sentences.en: According as the elementary market research, we find your products will be salable in China.
sentences.cn: 通过初步的市场调查, 我们感到贵公司的产品在中国有巨大的市场潜力.

sentences.en: According to these processes, petroleum can be converted into salable goods.
sentences.cn: 通过这些提炼过程, 石油就转换为可销售的商品.

sentences.en: Black Tea and Longjin Tea are salable in our market.
sentences.cn: 红茶和龙井茶在我们那很好卖.

sentences.en: Forever " multiple speed racing bicycles are sure to be salable in your market. "
sentences.cn: 永久牌 变速 跑车在你们的市场上一定很畅销.

sentences.en: How can the wshing machining be salable if we import yours at 380 yuan per set?
sentences.cn: 如果我们以每台380元的价格进口你方的产品,怎么能够卖得出去 呢 ?

sentences.en: In the other hand, they have o lot of salable technology , as technology of environmental protection.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 他们掌握了很多紧俏的具有绝对竞争力的项目, 如环保节能技术.

sentences.en: Products of this brand are salable in our market.
sentences.cn: 这个牌子的产品在我方市场上很畅销.

sentences.en: The books were sent back in salable condition.
sentences.cn: 这些书是在畅销的情况下被送回来.

sentences.en: The returnees come back with much more than salable skills.
sentences.cn: 回国者带回来的不仅仅是畅销的技能.

sentences.en: These items are most salable in our market.
sentences.cn: 在我方市场上,这些产品是最畅销的.

sentences.en: They are not as salable as canned fruit, I suppose.
sentences.cn: 我认为它们不象罐装水果那么畅消.

sentences.en: This product was salable for three yeast on local market.
sentences.cn: 这种产品在国内市场上畅销不衰已经三年了.

sentences.en: We must ask you to replace them with good salable ones.
sentences.cn: 我们必须请求贵方以能出售的货物更换该货.

sentences.en: Your quartz clocks are quite salable on our market.
sentences.cn: 你们的石英钟在市场上卖得不错.

words.tran_cn: 销售；出售；拍卖；销售额；廉价出售
畅销的；适于销售的；价格适当的

trans.tran_cn: 适于销售的，价格适当的，畅销的
